Expected Result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.

The Ether balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test Steps: Switch networks to a test network.
Expected Result:
The Sepolia balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Sepolia.

The recipient's hexadecimal address is shown.
The specified amount is shown.
The estimated gas details are shown.
The total amount is shown.

Test Steps: Proceed to edit the transaction gas fees.
Reduce the the Max base fee and Priority fee.
Test Data: e.g. Max base fee 0.00001 and Priority fee 0.00001.

Expected Result:
The transaction appears in the activity list.
The recipient's hexadecimal address is shown in the activity list item.
The amount is shown in the activity list item.

The transaction appears in the activity list.
The amount is shown in the activity list item.

Test Steps: Wait for the transaction to complete.
Notes: Two activity items; Send and Receive.

Test Steps: Open the Send activity list item.
Expected Result:
The updated gas fees are shown in the item details.
The transaction status, recipient's address, nonce, amount, gas and total are shown in the item details.
The created, submitted, cancel attempt and cancelled activity is shown in the activity log.

Test Steps: Proceed to view the transaction on the block explorer.
Expected Result: The block explorer opens in a new tab.

Test Steps: Open the Receive activity list item.
Expected Result: The transaction status, recipient's address, nonce, amount, gas and total are shown in the item details.

Test Steps: Proceed to view the transaction on the block explorer.
Expected Result: The block explorer opens in a new tab.
